head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LICHTENBERG, FRIEDEL ROTH SCHILD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LICHTENBERG, FRIEDEL ROTH SCHILD

block.p: LICHTENBERG - Friedel Roth schild, on Oct. 26, 2000. Beloved widow of Al Lichtenberg. Mother of Judith and Frank Lichtenberg, grandmother of Andrew and Alexander Lichtenberg and Daniel and Rachel Luban, mother-in-law of David Luban & Michelle Sullivan. Memorial service at 12:30 P.M., Sunday, October 29, Congregation Kol Ami, 252 Soundview Avenue White Plains, New York.

LICHTENBERG - Friedel Roth schild, on Oct. 26, 2000. Beloved widow of Al Lichtenberg. Mother of Judith and Frank Lichtenberg, grandmother of Andrew and Alexander Lichtenberg and Daniel and Rachel Luban, mother-in-law of David Luban & Michelle Sullivan.
